text:
You could argue that this is a documentation bug, but either
the docs need to stop saying that you can set the classloader
class, or WebappLoader needs to actually use the attribute. 

 This was originally reported to the tomcat-dev list by
"Volker Leidl" <leidl@nt.imp.univie.ac.at> with the subject
line "Replacing WebappClassLoader", but since they didn't
put it in bugzilla, and it's bothering me, I'm reporting it.

 If somebody will express an opinion as to whether fixing the
docs or the code is the right thing to do, I'll see about whipping
up a patch.
